  • Type Parameters:
    E - edge type
    All Implemented Interfaces:

    public abstract class RandomWalkVertex<E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends org.apache.giraph.graph.Vertex<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.DoubleWritable,E,org.apache.hadoop.io.DoubleWritable>
    Base class for executing a random walk on a graph

      • initialProbability

        protected double initialProbability()
        Compute an initial probability value for the vertex. Per default, we start with a uniform distribution.
        Returns:
        The initial probability value.

                           org.apache.giraph.edge.Edge<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,E> edge)
        Compute the probability of transitioning to a neighbor vertex
        Parameters:
        stateProbability - current steady state probability of the vertex
        edge - edge to neighbor
        Returns:
        the probability of transitioning to a neighbor vertex

        protected abstract double recompute(Iterable<org.apache.hadoop.io.DoubleWritable> messages,
               double teleportationProbability)
        Perform a single step of a random walk computation.
        Parameters:
        messages - Messages received in the previous step.
        teleportationProbability - Probability of teleporting to another vertex.
        Returns:
        The new probability distribution value.
